A0: the overwhelming support it received in both the state Senate and the House of Representatives
RelatedSentence: Possibly the coolest thing about this bill is the overwhelming support it received in both the state Senate and the House of Representatives .
First , the Senate passed it unanimously on April 1 and the House followed up with only two no votes ( compared to 96 yeses ) on April 23 .
The Senate then passed the amended bill with another unanimous vote , the last step before it was sent on to the Governor .
